snippet.title: Ruby's REBALANCED Halo 2 Legendary Mod!
snippet.description:
A modded Halo 2 Campaign that makes various balancing tweaks to make the game more fun and fair. But also several tweaks to weapon and vehicle attributes, and tweaks to the AI on every level and what weapons some of them will use. All for the sake of fleshing out Halo 2 to reach its full potential.

PATREON ►: https://www.patreon.com/RubyofBlue
TWITCH  ►: https://www.twitch.tv/ruby_of_blue
TWITTER ►: https://twitter.com/RubyofBlue
DEVIANTART ►: http://rubyofblue.deviantart.com/

DOWNLOAD FOR MASTER CHIEF COLLECTION:
https://www.nexusmods.com/halothemasterchiefcollection/mods/362

DOWNLOAD FOR PROJECT CARTOGRAPHER:
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1wbS__bcOHE1e7LusFFONMaUa932RDYMD

CHANGE LIST:
https://bit.ly/30IuImj

Project Cartographer:
https://www.cartographer.online/

Credit to UncookedMoa for Reclaimed fixes:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i-amNufZ-Hk

Recommended Viewing:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iYrBJ7eLtUY
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8pv7TGPDykkBSYqptzl49w
https://www.youtube.com/user/bpk428/videos

#halo2legendary #halomod #halo2rebalanced
